setup.title: Ion Setup
setup.subTitle: Get the app credentials from my.telegram.org/apps and fill out the form. If you have 2FA enabled, you'll have to enter your password too.
setup.successInfo: Ion should be up and running. You can verify it with the "ping" command.

settings.contributorsInfo: Thanks to anyone who made Ion become what it is.

scope.groupAndChannel: Works only in groups and channels

ping.name: Ping
ping.info: This module will help you check if your bot is running or not.

config.displayLatencyInfo: Enable this if you want latency to be displayed in response

afk.name: AFK
afk.info: The module helps other know that you are away from keyboard

shortlink.name: Short Link
shortlink.info: Generate short links for any URL quickly
